# Bika.ai: Automate your work with Business AI Agents

> Bika.ai, all-in-one AI workspace for creating business AI agents, combines AI chatbot, automation, databases, dashboards and wikis, manage and automate endless business processes. There's no need for constant chatting with AI. Bika.ai automates repetitive tasks and seamlessly executes across functions for your marketing, sales, and projects allowing you to focus on strategic work. 

Bika.ai is a Business AI Agents platform. 
What is **Business AI Agents**?
Business AI Agents is a workflow-driven agentic systems that integrate AI models, API tools, billion-row spreadsheet-databases, automation workflows, form, dashboard, AI chatbots, along with intelligent missions and reports generation.
This unified "Business AI Automation Agent" is designed to automate data-critical jobs in marketing, sales, project management, operations, and other business domains.

## Business AI Agents Templates & Marketplace

- [Templates Center](https://bika.ai/template)
- [Integrations](https://bika.ai/integration)
- [Create Apps with AI](https://bika.ai/ai-build-app)
